resources.string: Only Nexus 5X and 6P are currently supported

Possible values:
 0: standard USB charging or not plugged in
 1500-1.5: type C charging
 3000-3: type C charging (an USB A to USB C cable is non-compliant)

Possible values:
 0: standard USB charging or not plugged in
 1-1.5: type C charging
 3: type C charging (an USB A to USB C cable is non-compliant)
